job title: Quantitative Research Associate, Electronic Trading Strategies
job description:
Job Description
Our client is looking for a Quantitative Research Associate to join their Electronic Trading Strategies Desk.

Responsibilities:
  • Be an integral member of an elite team, engaging in the full stack of strategy development.
  • Analyze terabytes of raw tick data, identifying predictive market signals, and transforming them into new strategies.
  • Mine production strategy engine logs, engaging with traders and software developers to refine the performance of existing strategies.
  • Extend and optimize their research and development platform, streamlining the strategy development process


Requirements:
  • Python programming with a focus on data analysis (i.e. intimate, working knowledge of pandas, scipy and numpy modules).
  • Advanced statistical analysis skills.
  • Derivative pricing experience/expertise.
  • Experience with large data sets.
  • Passion for markets, trading and games.
  • A creative and flexible mindset.
  • Systematic and analytical approach to problem solving and software development.
  • Strong communication skills.
  • 18 months professional experience.
  • C++ programming would be favourable
  • Distributed & parallel computing would be favourable
  • Machine learning algorithms would be favourable
Education:
  • Undergraduate engineering degree in computer science and/or mathematics.
  • Graduate degree in statistics, mathematics and/or computer science.
If you would like to be considered for the position of Quantitative Research Associate or wish to discuss the role further then please leave your details below. Your resume will be held in confidence until you connect with a member of our team
